function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear efficacy of protection against re-infections in people with and without symptoms at their initial SARS-CoV-2 infection","Impact":"Uncertainty in determining the level of protection provided by natural immunity","Mitigation":"Further evaluation of the efficacy of protection against re-infections in symptomatic and asymptomatic individuals","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, research studies","People":"Individuals with a history of SARS-CoV-2 infection","Owner":"Health organizations, researchers"},{"Description":"Accumulating evidence on the efficacy and duration of natural immunity contributing to the mitigation of the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased reliance on natural immunity as a mitigation strategy without considering potential drawbacks","Mitigation":"Balancing the reliance on natural immunity with other preventive and therapeutic measures such as vaccines","Technologies":"Vaccines, preventive and therapeutic measures","People":"Public health authorities, policymakers","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies"}]}
